articles.title: Tanjung Pagar crash - driver was above alcohol limit and speeding: coroner's inquiry - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The coroner's inquiry into the deaths of five men killed on Feb 13 last year in a fiery car crash in Tanjong Pagar heard that the driver had hit speeds of up to 148kmh before the accident.
